data.name: Rogue Company - Year 1 Pass
data.detailed_description:
Includes:
- Year 1 Pass: Kestrel, Seeker, Mack, Switchblade, Runway, Cannon, Umbra, and Glimpse
- 500 Rogue Bucks
- North Star Phantom Legendary Outfit
- Iced Out Primary Weapon Wrap
- Iced Out Secondary Weapon Wrap
- Iced Out Melee Wrap
- Jackal Avatar
- Jackal Banner
- Jackal Border
data.about_the_game:
Includes:
- Year 1 Pass: Kestrel, Seeker, Mack, Switchblade, Runway, Cannon, Umbra, and Glimpse
- 500 Rogue Bucks
- North Star Phantom Legendary Outfit
- Iced Out Primary Weapon Wrap
- Iced Out Secondary Weapon Wrap
- Iced Out Melee Wrap
- Jackal Avatar
- Jackal Banner
- Jackal Border
data.short_description: Unlock all Rogues released in Year One with this pack. Unlock Kestrel, Seeker, Mack, Switchblade, Runway, Cannon, Umbra, and Glimpse immediately.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core i5-2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.20 ghz 12
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
